mapper.insert: insert into smart_sql (s_id, s_time, s_value, s_level) values (#{sId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sValue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select s_id, s_time, s_value, s_level from smart_sql
select * from smart_sql order by s_id desc limit 4 ;
select * from smart_sql where s_time>=date_add(now(),interval -3 day);
